sys_ui_message.message:
You can find your leave balance on Workday: 1. Click on the cloud icon or your profile picture and select **view profile** from the drop-down list. 2. Underneath your name and surname on the left of your screen, click on **Time off**. 3. Select **Time Off Balance**. 4. Click on **View Time Off Balance**. 5. All types of leave will appear. Your balance can be seen as **Accumulated Leave**.
Your accumulated leave may be encashed or used as holiday leave instead of annual leave. Please note that we can only encash up to 12 days of accumulated leave per year.
